prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that embodies the essence of a lost soul with a haunting appearance.
Imagine a spooky Pokemon with dark colors and an eerie mask, perfect for a Halloween theme.
Design a Pokemon that roams ancient ruins, blending seamlessly into its ghostly surroundings.
Show me a Pokemon that represents sorrow and mystery, featuring a blend of black and yellow.
Generate a character based on a spirit that guides lost travelers through misty forests.
Make a Pokemon that has a shadowy figure and a mask-like face, evoking feelings of nostalgia.
Give me a ghostly creature with a unique shape and a connection to the afterlife.
